content: the pattern us terms introduction what do you do when you have a beautiful friend across the other side of the world who sends you the most beautiful faux fur pom poms and what do you do when you have a husband who loves hats that look totally unique and different well… you make a beanie of course so this is a very special project designed for 2 amazing people to show that love and kindness go a very long way what you will need yarn i used stylecraft special chunky for this beanie however any chunky yarn will work amount… well the main color used less than 100g and i used under 50g for the contrast colors you may also use worsted or medium worsted aran weight however be sure to make the ribbing longer than the pattern suggests and keep to the required maths hook i used a 6mm with my yarn but feel free to use the appropriate size hook for the yarn you have chosen this hat is designed to fit an adult male with a head circumference of 21 inches and a final hat height of 7 inches from the top of the ribbing to the pom pom… however again it can be tailored to suit any head… ©tinyanaesthetist 2018 zahra fazel all rights reserved please do not distribute or modify the pattern however you are free to make as many hats as you please from the pattern provided you credit me i would love to see your beanie so please tag me #akilspompombeanie shall we begin the pattern… abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet chain chain blo back loop only 2dctog double_crochet 2 together or decrease block stitch your chain length needs to be a multiple of 3 + 2 chains in this case your final ribbing length needs to be a multiple of 3 + 2 in our pattern i have 56 as my magic number 18 x 3 = 54 and then add on 2 to give a final of 56 so you continue your ribbing till you have 56 row or the required length depending on your yarn used a note on colors you can use as many or as few colors as you want storm blue for ribbing and for double_crochet part of block stitch white for accent color for single_crochet part of block stitch white silver and graphite for double_crochet part of block stitch ©tinyanaesthetist 2018 zahra fazel please tag me #akilspompombeanie the beanie the beanie is worked from the ribbing upward and then in the round ribbing the ch1 at the start of the row doesn t count as a stitch chain 7 row 1 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook and continue to the end of the chain 6sc
